page.title: 11FARMING (CONTINUED)
page.content: 4. MIDDLETON LODGE FARM 600 ACRES MR TIMMS OWNS THIS MIXED FARM. HE GROWS WHEAT, BARLEY AND OATS, AND HAS 260 CALVES. HE SELLS THE ANIMALS AT BANBURY MARKET, AND THE CROPS TO A MERCHANT. 5. HOME FARM 274 ACRES OWNED BY MR FENNYMORE, WHO GROWS WHEAT, BARLEY AND BEANS, AND 400 SHEEP. THE MACHINERY IS MODERN AND 3 WORKERS HELP HIM. 6. POLLARD'S FARM 130 ACRES MR POLLARD OWNS THIS MIXED FARM. HE GROWS WHEAT AND BARLEY, AND KEEPS 400 COWS, 15 SHEEP, 130 SOWS, 2 DOGS, 12 HENS AND A CAT! 7. LORDS FARM 100 ACRES THE LORDS OWN 80 ACRES AND RENT THE REST. THEY ONLY PRODUCE MILK AND KEEP 47 COWS, 19 CALVES AND 1 BULL. EACH COW COSTS #150. THERE ARE 3 WORKERS.
